channel.title: Health on Goodroot
channel.description: Recent content in Health on Goodroot

item.title: Practice Makes
item.description: The brightest people I know practice or learn. Engineering things on the Internet is strange; it’s a new frontier. It is folly to hope to understand even a fraction of our beloved and capable global network. In the tangle of all these topics to practice, what kind of patterns are we imprinting? This weekend, you’ve learned the basics of Ruby; next weekend, as per usual, you’re interested in learning something new.

item.title: Declutter Your Digital Life
item.description: Many years ago, I had my life transformed by a silly book about cleaning. It was called: The Life Changing Magic of Tidying Up and it was written by tidying Marie Kond≈ç. Marie suggests taking a step back from your busy life, breathing deeply, then decluttering your life in one ruthless material purge. To become happier, more productive, and less stressed, she teaches one how to craft a simplified existence surrounded only by the things that spark joy within.
